awards.text: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 5 wins & 16 nominations.

fullplot: Difficult tale of poor, struggling South Carolinian mother & daughter, who each face painful choices with their resolve and pride. Bone, the eldest daughter, and Anney her tired mother, grow both closer and farther apart: Anney sees Glen as her last chance.

title: Bastard Out of Carolina
